passes.description: Ensure an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
passes.help: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes

passes.description: Ensure role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
passes.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

passes.description: Ensure ARIA attributes are used as described in the specification of the element's role
passes.help: ARIA attributes must be used as specified for the element's role

passes.description: Ensure elements do not use deprecated roles
passes.help: Deprecated ARIA roles must not be used

passes.description: Ensure aria-hidden="true" is not present on the document body.
passes.help: aria-hidden="true" must not be present on the document body

passes.description: Ensure ARIA attributes are not prohibited for an element's role
passes.help: Elements must only use permitted ARIA attributes

passes.description: Ensure elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
passes.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

passes.description: Ensure all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
passes.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

passes.description: Ensure all ARIA attributes have valid values
passes.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

passes.description: Ensure attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
passes.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

passes.description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
passes.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

passes.description: Ensure buttons have discernible text
passes.help: Buttons must have discernible text

passes.description: Ensure each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
passes.help: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

passes.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
passes.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

passes.description: Ensure each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element
passes.help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

passes.description: Ensure headings have discernible text
passes.help: Headings should not be empty

passes.description: Ensure form field does not have multiple label elements
passes.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

passes.description: Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

passes.description: Ensure every HTML document has a lang attribute
passes.help: <html> element must have a lang attribute

passes.description: Ensure the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value
passes.help: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

passes.description: Ensure that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
passes.help: Form elements should have a visible label

passes.description: Ensure every form element has a label
passes.help: Form elements must have labels

passes.description: Ensure the banner landmark is at top level
passes.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

passes.description: Ensure the contentinfo landmark is at top level
passes.help: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark

passes.description: Ensure the main landmark is at top level
passes.help: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

passes.description: Ensure the document has at most one banner landmark
passes.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

passes.description: Ensure the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
passes.help: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

passes.description: Ensure the document has at most one main landmark
passes.help: Document should not have more than one main landmark

passes.description: Ensure the document has a main landmark
passes.help: Document should have one main landmark

passes.description: Ensure landmarks are unique
passes.help: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

passes.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
passes.help: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

passes.description: Ensure links have discernible text
passes.help: Links must have discernible text

passes.description: Ensure that lists are structured correctly
passes.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

passes.description: Ensure <li> elements are used semantically
passes.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

passes.description: Ensure <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount
passes.help: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%

passes.description: Ensure <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
passes.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled

passes.description: Ensure interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
passes.help: Interactive controls must not be nested

passes.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
passes.help: Page should contain a level-one heading

passes.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
passes.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks
